actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to permanently ban credit card surcharges, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Anti-Credit Card Surcharge Act - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to repeal the provision which ends the prohibition against credit card surcharges on February 27, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to permanently ban credit card surcharges, and for other purposes.
